tool_description: Get all details of assets, get top 100 assets free, paid and new.
name: Unity AssetStore
title: Unity AssetStore

api_list.name: Get Basic Info Assets By ID.
api_list.description:
Get Basic Info Assets By ID.
- Name
- ID
- Value
- Images
- Videos
- Description
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://unity-assetstore.p.rapidapi.com/basic-info/32351"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "unity-assetstore.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://unity-assetstore.p.rapidapi.com/basic-info/{asset_id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "unity-assetstore.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Assets Details By ID.
api_list.description: Get Assets Details even deprecated By ID, it will return all information about asset.
api_list.code:

url = "https://unity-assetstore.p.rapidapi.com/details/32351"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "unity-assetstore.p.rapidapi.com"
        }
